sheetQuery.byCounty:
select m.process_instance_id, m.theme, m.city, m.country, m.station_name, to_char( m.create_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_char( m.send_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), m.engineer, m.assignee, m.parent_process_instance_id, decode(m.male_guest_state, 2, (select task_def_key_name from pnr_act_transfer_office_main where process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id), m.task_def_key_name) as task_def_key_name, decode(m.male_guest_state, 2, (select task_def_key from pnr_act_transfer_office_main where process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id), m.task_def_key) as task_def_key, decode(m.male_guest_state, 2, (select to_char(last_reply_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') from pnr_act_transfer_office_main where process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id), to_char(m.last_reply_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) as last_reply_time, m.barrier_number from taw_system_area a, pnr_act_transfer_office_main m where a.areaid = m.city and a.parentareaid = '28' and THEMEINTERFACE = 'maleGuest' and m.task_def_key in ('acheck', 'twoSpotChecks', 'auditReport', 'archive') and exists (select 1 from pnr_act_transfer_office_handle l where l.process_instance_id = m.process_instance_id and l.FAULT_TYPE = '10123190101') and @send_time@ and nvl(m.male_guest_state, '0') in ('0', '3') and m.theme like '(重修)%' and @city@
union all
select m.process_instance_id, m.theme, m.city, m.country, m.station_name, to_char( m.create_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_char( m.send_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), m.engineer, m.assignee, m.parent_process_instance_id, decode(m.male_guest_state, 2, (select task_def_key_name from pnr_act_transfer_office_main where process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id), m.task_def_key_name) as task_def_key_name, decode(m.male_guest_state, 2, (select task_def_key from pnr_act_transfer_office_main where process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id), m.task_def_key) as task_def_key, decode(m.male_guest_state, 2, (select to_char(last_reply_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') from pnr_act_transfer_office_main where process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id), to_char(m.last_reply_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) as last_reply_time, m.barrier_number from taw_system_area a, pnr_act_transfer_office_main m where a.areaid = m.city and a.parentareaid = '28' and THEMEINTERFACE = 'maleGuest' and m.task_def_key = 'auditor' and exists (select 1 from pnr_act_transfer_office_handle l where l.process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id and l.FAULT_TYPE = '10123190101') and @send_time@ and m.male_guest_state = '2' and m.theme like '(重修)%' and @city@
union all
select m.process_instance_id, m.theme, m.city, m.country, m.station_name, to_char(m.create_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_char(m.send_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), m.engineer, m.assignee, m.parent_process_instance_id, decode(m.male_guest_state, 2, (select task_def_key_name from pnr_act_transfer_office_main where process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id), m.task_def_key_name) as task_def_key_name, decode(m.male_guest_state, 2, (select task_def_key from pnr_act_transfer_office_main where process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id), m.task_def_key) as task_def_key, decode(m.male_guest_state, 2, (select to_char(last_reply_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') from pnr_act_transfer_office_main where process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id), to_char(m.last_reply_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) as last_reply_time, m.barrier_number from taw_system_area a, pnr_act_transfer_office_main m where a.areaid = m.city and a.parentareaid = '28' and m.THEMEINTERFACE = 'maleGuest' and @city@ and ((m.task_def_key in ('acheck', 'twoSpotChecks', 'auditReport', 'archive') and nvl(m.male_guest_state, '0') in ('0', '3') and exists (select 1 from pnr_act_transfer_office_handle l where l.process_instance_id = m.process_instance_id and l.FAULT_TYPE = '10123190101')) or (m.task_def_key = 'auditor' and m.male_guest_state = '2' and exists (select 1 from pnr_act_transfer_office_handle l where l.process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id and l.FAULT_TYPE = '10123190101'))) and @send_time@ and barrier_number in (select barrier_number from (select areaid, barrier_number, count(process_instance_id) - 1 as t_us_num from (select a.areaid, m.barrier_number, process_instance_id from taw_system_area a, pnr_act_transfer_office_main m where a.areaid = m.city and a.parentareaid = '28' and THEMEINTERFACE = 'maleGuest' and m.task_def_key in ('acheck', 'twoSpotChecks', 'auditReport', 'archive') and exists (select 1 from pnr_act_transfer_office_handle l where l.process_instance_id = m.process_instance_id and l.FAULT_TYPE = '10123190101') and @send_time@ and @city@ and nvl(m.male_guest_state, '0') in ('0', '3') and barrier_number <> '无' union all select a.areaid, m.barrier_number, process_instance_id from taw_system_area a, pnr_act_transfer_office_main m where a.areaid = m.city and a.parentareaid = '28' and THEMEINTERFACE = 'maleGuest' and m.task_def_key = 'auditor' and exists (select 1 from pnr_act_transfer_office_handle l where l.process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id and l.FAULT_TYPE = '10123190101') and @send_time@ and @city@ and m.male_guest_state = '2' and barrier_number <> '无') group by areaid, barrier_number having count(process_instance_id) > 1))
